marginalia.anchor_text: Liquet igitur denuo, hanc arte[m] esse omniu[m] maxima[m], cu[m] uero pauci aut uix ulli ad eam pertingere possint, alij negligunt, alij infamem supposititijs commentis reddunt

position.marginalia_text: Eade[m] est r[ati]o Ptoloma[e]i in fine sui capitis quadripartiti.

marginalia.translation: Ptolemy has the same reason in the end of the chapter of his 'Quadripartiti'.

position.marginalia_text: Asce[n]dit ♍ ♃ fere, ita q[uod] o[mn]es illi planet[a]e ferè essent in prima domo rude clarius indiciu[m] erat de illo in gymnasiu[m] introitu. ♃ ☿ et ♂ et ☾ co[n]iunctis. ☿ domino asce[n]de[n]t[i]s ia[m] [gr - ge[ne]r[atur]??].

marginalia.translation: Jupiter hardly ascended in Virgo, so that to him all planets hardly are in the first undeveloped house. A clearer indication of him was to go into the gymnasium. With Jupiter, Mercury, and Mars, and the Moon in conjunction. Venus to the lord of the ascendent already [...].
